interpretation:
The hammer emoji represents strength, power, and determination. It symbolizes the ability to overcome obstacles and achieve goals through hard work and perseverance. When this card appears in a reading, it suggests that the querent has the necessary tools and skills to tackle any challenges that come their way. However, it also advises caution in the use of that power, as it can be destructive if not wielded wisely. 

Associated keywords: strength, power, determination, hard work, perseverance, tool, caution. 

In a love reading, the hammer emoji can indicate a need for balance in the relationship, as one partner may be exerting too much control or dominance. In a career reading, it suggests success through consistent effort and a willingness to take on challenges. Overall, the hammer card reminds us that we have the power to shape our own lives and accomplish great things through our own efforts.
